name: Tina Kelley
bio: Tina Kelley is the author of Abloom and Awry, Precise, and The Gospel of Galore, winner of a 2003 Washington State Book Award. She coauthored Almost Home: Helping Kids Move from Homelessness to Hope, and she reported for the New York Times for 10 years, sharing a staff Pulitzer Prize for 9/11 coverage.
